elementValueMap.ABSProfileFlag: =IF(%userProfile% = '#ABS Customer Service Analyst' || %userProfile% = '#ABS Customer Service Supervisor',true,false)
elementValueMap.AltChannelProfileFlag: =IF (%userProfile% = 'Partner Support Team' || %userProfile% = 'Frontier Partner Portal User' || %userProfile% = '#Alternate Channel Leadership',true,false)
elementValueMap.CustomerServiceProfileFlag: =IF(%userProfile% = '#CTF RegionalSalesMgr' || %userProfile% = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst' || %userProfile% = '#BAM - Business Account Manager',true,false)
elementValueMap.WholesaleProfileFlag: =IF(%userProfile% != NULL && %userProfile% == 'Carrier Account Executive',true,IF(%userProfile% != NULL && %userProfile% == 'Carrier Sales Manager',true,IF(%userProfile% != NULL && %userProfile% == 'Carrier SE',true,IF(%userProfile% != NULL && %userProfile% == 'Carrier SE Supervisor',true,IF(%userProfile% != NULL && %userProfile% == 'Carrier SSC',true,false)))))
